mapper.insert: insert into t_car (id, car_num, brand, guide_price, produce_time, car_type) values (#{id}, #{carNum}, #{brand}, #{guidePrice}, #{produceTime}, #{carType})
mapper.update: update t_car set car_num = #{carNum}, brand = #{brand}, guide_price = #{guidePrice}, produce_time = #{produceTime}, car_type = #{carType} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, car_num as carNum, brand, guide_price as guidePrice, produce_time as produceTime, car_type as carType from t_car where id = #{id}
